html:
{% if doc.offer_type == "Regular Job Offer" %}
{{letter_head}}

Date : - {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('offer_date'), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}

Ref : - {{doc.reference or ''}}

Sub: Appointment as " {{doc.designation or ''}} "

{% set full_name = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_name") %}

Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ''}},


This has reference to the discussions you had with us. We are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation or ''}}, with High Noon Consulting Private Limited, deputed at, {{full_name or ''}} & {{doc.location or ''}} on the following terms and conditions: -


1. By accepting this offer you agree to serve a notice period of thirty calendar days from acceptance of your resignation to seek release from the current position.


2. Your annual remuneration shall be Rs. {{"{:,.0f}".format(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary + doc.annualized_pf_employer_contribution + doc.annualized_esic_employer_contribution_amount))}} ({{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary + doc.annualized_pf_employer_contribution + doc.annualized_esic_employer_contribution_amount)) }}) You will also be eligible for Group Medical Insurance coverage. Standard Income tax deductions shall be applicable. Refer Annexure I. You are supposed to submit your tax savings investment declaration form for the financial year (corresponding to assessment year) in order to arrive at your income tax liability.


3. The company also reserves the right to terminate your services without any Notice or without any consolidated amount in lieu thereof on the grounds of misconduct, or even in the case of reasonable suspicion of misconduct, disloyalty, commission of any act involving moral turpitude, or any act of indiscipline or inefficiency or loss of confidence or technical delivery performance issues.


4. Your services are also liable to be terminated if you absent yourself without leave intimation or remain absent beyond the period of leave originally granted or subsequently extended and it shall be construed by the Company that you have voluntarily abandoned your services, unless you return to work within a period of 8 days from the commencement of such absence.


5. You are not eligible for paid leave for the first three months. After the completion of three months, you are eligible for one paid leave per month of service. These paid leaves will be accumulated quarterly (three months) during the current financial year (Apr to Mar). Per quarter you will be entitled to avail 3 Paid leaves. Un-availed paid leaves shall not be carried forward to subsequent financial/fiscal year(s).


6. The regular Office Timings allotted to you are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST, 5 days a week. You may be called upon to work in any shift or any time, depending upon the exigencies of the work. Please note that work timings at the deputed clients’ work site would be as per Client’s sole discretion.


7. This appointment is subject to you being medically examined and found fit. The Management has the right to get you medically examined by any qualified medical practitioner during the period of your services. In case you are found medically unfit to continue with the job, you will lose your lien on the job.


8. This appointment is also subject to satisfactory report from your former employers and the references given by you.


9. During the course of the engagement and if the nature of your job so requires, the Company may send you for specialized training within India or overseas in order to enable you to perform more effectively. In such an event you will be required to execute a training bond with the Company.


10. All other Standard Rules of the Company, as existing now and as may be amended from time to time, will be applicable to you.


11. In the event of the State/Central Government enacting any law conferring the same or similar benefits extended to you under this letter, you will be entitled to the more beneficial of the two, but not both.


12.You are required to maintain the highest order of discipline and confidentiality with regard to the work of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or associate Companies or its Clients. You are required to maintain decorum in accordance with your position. In case of any breach of discipline/trust, your services may be terminated by the Company with immediate effect.


13. All inventions, improvements, discoveries made by you either alone or with other persons w ill become the sole property of the Company. You will ensure that patent protections are obtained for such inventions/improvements and discoveries in India or elsewhere and assign the same to the Company.


14. You are required to devote the whole of your attention and abilities exclusively for the business of the Company and shall in all respects obey and conform to the regulations from time to time framed and issued by the Company and applicable to you. You shall not, while in the engagement with the Company, be engaged in any other employment, business whatsoever or hold any office of profit or accept any other emoluments without previous consent in writing of the Company.


15. This offer of engagement is based on the information furnished in your application for employment, information verified from your former employers, references provided by you and valid background verification report made available to us. If, at any time in future, it comes to light that any of this information is incorrect, false or any relevant information has been withheld or suppressed in any manner, then your services are liable to be terminated without any Notice or any Compensation in lieu thereof.


16. The Company lays emphasis on all statutory compliances and you should ensure compliance with various statutes in your area of operations including Insider Trading Regulations.


17. Income Tax deductions will be done in accordance with relevant provisions of the Income Tax Act 1961 after considering valid tax exemptions and savings done by you during period of your employment relating to corresponding financial year with High Noon Consulting Private Limited.


You are hereby informed that you have to provide us with information & documents regarding your tax savings investments and expenses within a period of 120 days from the date of joining. In case you fail to provide them then differential income tax as may be agreed will be deducted from your salary after prior intimation.


t is hereby informed and you consent that income tax deduction shall be done by the employer(as agreed) as per applicable tax rates in force on salary or other monetary or non-monetary benefits earned from High Noon Consulting Private Limited and that the High Noon Consulting Private Limited (employer) shall not be liable for tax deduction on prior period income earned by the employee.


18. You shall, during the term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year from the date of expiration or termination of this Agreement, refrain from soliciting, recruiting or hiring, or attempting to solicit, recruit or hire, directly or by assisting others, any Personnel of the Company.


19. Your appointment is with effect from the date of joining, which should in any case be not later than {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('joining_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.


20. You are requested to please produce all your originals for a spot verification process and submit a copy of all your credentials for office records duly signed by self.


21. If your engagement on the above term and conditions is acceptable to you, kindly sign the copy of this letter in token of your acceptance and return the same to us for our records by {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('response_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.


22. If you fail to convey your acceptance and report on the specified date. It will be presumed that you are not interested on the said engagement and the offer issued to you will be cancelled without any reference.


23. You are required to submit your monthly time sheets along with approval mail from the client as per the company’s protocol in order to process your payroll.


We congratulate you and welcome aboard {{doc.company or ''}} .

This has reference to the discussions you had with us. We are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation or ''}}, with High Noon Consulting Private Limited, deputed at, {{full_name or ''}} & {{doc.location or ''}} on the following terms and conditions: -

1.By accepting this offer you agree to serve a notice period of thirty calendar days from acceptance of your resignation to seek release from the current position.

2.Your annual remuneration shall be Rs. {{"{:,.0f}".format(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary))}} pa ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary))}}), It is understood and confirmed that at the expiry of period of employment or close of financial year, whichever is earlier.

3.Income tax on above mentioned remuneration earned from the High Noon Consulting Private Limited shall be deducted (@ applicable rate of 10%) from the last drawn remuneration after intimating for the same.

4.Please note that if your total remuneration crosses the threshold of 20 lakhs per annum as provided under the Goods & Services Tax Act then Goods and service tax will be applicable.

5.The company also reserves the right to terminate your contract without any Notice or without any consolidated amount in lieu thereof on the grounds of misconduct, or even in the case of reasonable suspicion of misconduct, disloyalty, breach of employment conditions, commission of any act involving moral turpitude, or any act of indiscipline or inefficiency or loss of confidence or technical delivery performance issues.

6.Your services are also liable to be terminated if you absent yourself without leave intimation or remain absent beyond the period of leave originally granted or subsequently extended and it shall be construed by the Company that you have voluntarily abandoned your services, unless you return to work within a period of 8 days from the commencement of such absence.

7.You are not eligible for paid leave for the first three months. After the completion of three months, you are eligible for one paid leave per month of service. These paid leaves will be accumulated quarterly (three months) during the current financial year (Apr to Mar). Per quarter you will be entitled to avail 3 Paid leaves. Un-availed paid leaves shall not be carried forward to subsequent financial/fiscal year(s).

8.The regular Office Timings allotted to you are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST, 5 days a week. You may be called upon to work in any shift or any time, depending upon the exigencies of the work.

Please note that work timings at the deputed clients’ work site would be as per Client’s sole discretion.

9.This appointment is subject to you being medically examined and found fit. The Management has the right to get you medically examined by any qualified medical practitioner during the period of your services. In case you are found medically unfit to continue with the job, you will lose your lien on the job.

10.This appointment is also subject to satisfactory report from your former employers and the references provided by you to us.

11.During the course of the engagement and if the nature of your job so requires, the Company may send you for specialized training within India or overseas in order to enable you to perform more effectively. In such an event you will be required to execute a training bond with the Company.

12.All other Standard Rules of the Company, as existing now and as may be amended from time to time, will be applicable to you.

13.In the event of the State/Central Government enacting any law conferring the same or similar benefits extended to you under this letter, you will be entitled to the more beneficial of the two, but not both.

14.You are required to maintain the highest order of discipline and confidentiality with regard to the work of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or associate Companies or its Clients. You are required to maintain decorum in accordance with your position. In case of any breach of discipline/trust, your services may be terminated by the Company with immediate effect.

15.All inventions, improvements, discoveries made by you either alone or with other persons will become the sole property of the Company. You will ensure that patent protections are obtained for such inventions/improvements and discoveries in India or elsewhere and assign the same to the Company.

16.You are required to devote the whole of your attention and abilities exclusively for the business of the Company and shall in all respects obey and conform to the regulations from time to time framed and issued by the Company and applicable to you. You shall not, while in the engagement with the Company, be engaged in any other employment, business whatsoever or hold any office of profit or accept any other emoluments without previous consent in writing of the Company.

17.This offer of engagement is based on the information furnished in your application for employment, information verified from your former employers, references provided by you and valid background verification report made available to us. If, at any time in future, it comes to light that any of this information is incorrect, false or any relevant information has been withheld or suppressed in any manner, then your services are liable to be terminated without any Notice or any Compensation in lieu thereof.

18.The Company lays emphasis on all statutory compliances and you should ensure compliance with various statutes in your area of operations including Insider Trading Regulations.

19.Income Tax deductions will be done in accordance with relevant provisions of the Income Tax Act 1961 on the remuneration drawn during the period of your employment with High Noon Consulting Private Limited.

You shall be provided the company a valid monthly invoice for your services rendered to the company duly signed and stamped.

In case of Goods and Service Tax applicable to you then you shall provide us with monthly tax invoice as stated in Goods and Service Tax Act and shall comply with all necessary compliances under Goods and Service Tax Act.

It is hereby informed and you consent that income tax deduction shall be done by the employer(as agreed) as per applicable income tax rates in force on salary or other monetary benefits earned from High Noon Consulting Private Limited  and that the High Noon Consulting Private Limited (employer) shall not be liable for tax deduction on prior period income earned by the employee.

20.You shall, during the term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year from the date of expiration or termination of this Agreement, refrain from soliciting, recruiting or hiring, or attempting to solicit, recruit or hire, directly or by assisting others, any Personnel of the Company.

21.Your appointment is with effect from the date of joining, which should in any case be not later than {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('joining_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.

22.You are requested to please -

a.Produce all your originals for a spot verification process.
b.Submit a copy of all your credentials for office records duly signed by self.

23.If your engagement on the above term and conditions is acceptable to you, kindly sign the copy of this letter in token of your acceptance and return the same to us for our records by {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('response_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.

24.If you fail to convey your acceptance and report on the specified date. It will be presumed that you are not interested on the said engagement and the offer issued to you will be cancelled without any reference.

25.You are required to submit your monthly time sheets along with approval  mail from the client as per the company’s protocol in order to process your remuneration.

We congratulate you and welcome aboard {{doc.company or ''}}

This has reference to the discussions you had with us. We are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation or ''}},with High Noon Consulting Private Limited, deputed at, {{full_name}} & {{doc.location or ''}} on the following terms and conditions:-

This Consultancy Agreement (the Agreement) made on this {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('joining_date'), "dd MMM yyyy") }} BY AND BETWEEN:

{{caddress_title or ''}}, a company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and having its Registered Office at {{caddress_line1 or ''}}, {{caddress_line2 or ''}}, {{ ccity or ''}}, {{cstate or ''}}, {{ccountry or ''}} ., (hereinafter referred to as “the Company” which expression shall unless it be repugnant to the context or meaning thereof be deemed to mean and include its successors and assigns) OF THE ONE PART

AND

{{salutation or ''}} {{doc.applicant_name or ''}} son of {{applicant_father_name or ''}}, aged {{age or ''}} years, residing at {{ jline1 or ''}}, {{jaddress_line2 or ''}}, {{jcity or ''}}, {{jstate or ''}}-{{jpost_pin or ''}}, {{jcountry or ''}}. (hereinafter referred to as “the Consultant” which expression shall unless it be repugnant to the context or meaning thereof be deemed to mean and include his heirs, legal representatives, administrators, successors and assigns) OF THE OTHER PART.

(The Company and the Consultant herein after singularly referred to as “the Party” and collectively referred to as “the Parties”)

WHEREAS, the Consultant approached the Company to offer certain professional services as per requirements of the Company, on the terms and conditions as set forth below:

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants as set forth herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Parties agree as follows:

1. Services:
The Consultant shall be appointed by the Company in the capacity of “ {{doc.designation or ''}}” on non-exclusive basis to render the professional Work like software development, maintenance, testing and SAP platform based services as may be required by the Company.

2. TERMINATION:
(a) The Company or the Consultant may terminate this Agreement by giving 30 days’ written notice to the other party. Upon such termination, the obligations of both Parties shall come to an end.
Obligations relating to non-hire of employees and confidentiality) and the Consultant shall immediately hand over to the Company, all documents, papers, data, confidential information, or any other information obtained by him/her during the course of the Agreement and shall fully co-operate with the Company to ensure a smooth and orderly transition of information, data and records to the Company.
(b) The Company shall be relieved of any obligation to pay the Consultant for any services except for those, which may have been performed up to the date of termination

3. RELATIONSHIP:
Except as specifically set forth herein, nothing contained in this Agreement shall be construed as contract of employment or fiduciary relationship or partnership among the Parties. This Agreement does not authorize Parties to assume, create or undertake any obligation of any kind expressed or implied, on behalf of or in the name of any of the other Party without express, written consent. The Consultant shall not have any right or authority to accept any service of process or to receive any notices on behalf of the Company or to enter into any commitments, undertakings or agreements purporting to obligate the Company in any way or to amend, modify or vary any existing agreements to which the Company is or shall be a party.

4. COMPLIANCE WITH LOCAL LAWS:
The Consultant shall be responsible for legal and statutory compliance with local laws, taxation and all other applicable laws. The Consultant shall indemnify the Company all costs, including any interest, penalties and legal expenses and fees that the Company may incur as a result of non-compliance with any laws or acts as applicable.

5. FEES:
The Company shall pay to the Consultant a Professional Service fee of Rs. {{"{:,.0f}".format(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annualized_ctc or ''))}}. per Annum ({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.annualized_ctc or '')}}) Per Annum exclusive of GST @18% and 10% TDS inclusive (current rate).

The Consultant shall submit an invoice, along with approved timesheet for the work rendered by him/her at the end of the calendar month.

The Consultant shall submit GSTR 1 or relevant forms under GST laws within the applicable due dates, for company to avail Input Tax credit for respective month.

The Company shall make a payment to the Consultant within 15 days from the date of receipt of the invoice and approved timesheet after withholding GST @ 18% till the time of filing of GSTR 1 or relevant forms by the consultant.

The consultant shall intimate the company the filing of GSTR 1 or relevant form within the due dates, for company to release the withholded amount of GST @ 18% to the consultant.

Unless agreed otherwise, the Consultant shall be required to work as per the monthly calendar days during the duration of this Agreement.

6. (a) TAXES:
The Consultant shall be solely responsible for charging in the invoice the GST @18% and remittance of any indirect taxes such as GST after recovery from the Company as required by Regulations if applicable. All payments to the Consultant shall be subject to applicable deduction of tax at source at prevailing rate of TDS under the Income Tax Act 1961.

(b) INSURANCE:
The Consultant shall be solely responsible for having his/her own medical or accident insurance policies and the Company shall have no obligation or liability with respect to any expenses incurred by the Consultant relating to the above-referred risks.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY:
During the term of this Agreement and thereafter at all times, Consultant shall keep strictly confidential all transactions, records and information received by him/her from the Company and/or developed or prepared by him/her or by his/her staff or sub- contractors, if any, pursuant to this Agreement. The Consultant shall sign a confidentiality agreement before commencing on any assignment. A sample of such letter is included in Appendix A

8. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS:
All software, systems, ideas, concept, designs, documentation or any other material the Consultant shall have access to during currency of this Agreement will either be Intellectual Property of the Company or that of its Customers. The Consultant shall not have any rights to such material described as above.
For the avoidance of doubt, while the IPR shall vest in the Company or its customer in relation to any idea or concept shared by the Consultant which has been adopted and developed by the Company.
The Consultant shall further, if required by the Company, undertake in writing that the Consultant shall not use any software, system, idea, etc. which is an intellectual property of any other person or body corporate including the Company, to which the Consultant had access to in the course of the assignment.

9. NON-SOLICITATION:
During the course of this Agreement and for the period of 1 year thereafter, the Consultant shall not directly or indirectly solicit or seek employment for the employees of the Company or make any arrangement for subcontracting of the Company’s employees for the benefit of any third party.

10. INDEMNITY:
The Consultant shall at all times indemnify, defend and hold the Company harmless against all claims, charges, expenses, costs, damage (including, without limitation, its employees) arising out of or related to any act or omission on the part of the Consultant or personal injury, misrepresentation, breach of law, breach of confidentiality, breach of intellectual property rights, death or loss of or damage to property caused by its negligence.

11. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY:
In no event shall the Company be liable to the Consultant or any other party for any special, indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary or punitive damages of any kind arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, the services, whether based on Agreement, tort or otherwise, even if it has been advised of the possibility of such damages or should have foreseen such damages.
In no event, the Company’s aggregate liability (whether in Agreement, tort, including negligence, or otherwise) under or in connection with this Agreement shall exceed the sum equal to the fees paid under this Agreement for two (02) months prior to the date of occurrence of cause. Page 4 of 7 .

12. TRAVEL AND EXPENSES:
All business travel and other expenses will be reimbursed to the Consultant by the Company if the travel and expenses are incurred with the prior written approval of the Company.

13. PERFORMANCE:
Failure on part of the Company, at any time, to require performance of any provisions of the Agreement and/or any obligations by the Consultant set forth in this Agreement, shall not affect the right to require full performance thereof at any time thereafter.

14. ENGAGEMENT:
This Agreement is executed based on the individual professional expertise of the Consultant and the Consultant agrees not to assign this Agreement or any rights or obligations hereunder, to any third party without prior written consent of the Company.

15. AMENDMENT:
No modification, deletion, amendment or variation of any term or provision of this Agreement shall be of any force or effect, unless stated in writing and signed by the Parties, or in case of a waiver, signed by the Party granting the waiver. No verbal agreement or understanding or conduct of any nature relating to the subject matter hereof shall be considered valid and enforceable.

16. NOTICE:
Any notice or other information required or authorized by this Agreement to be given by either Party to the other may be given by hand or sent by first class pre-paid post or by facsimile to the other, at the following addresses.

html:
{% if doc.offer_type == "VPF Regular Job Offer" %}
{{letter_head}}

Date : - {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('offer_date'), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}

Ref : - {{doc.reference or ''}}

Sub: Appointment as " {{doc.designation or ''}} "

{% set full_name = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_name") %}

Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ''}},


This has reference to the discussions you had with us. We are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation or ''}}, with High Noon Consulting Private Limited, deputed at, {{full_name or ''}} & {{doc.location or ''}} on the following terms and conditions: -


1. By accepting this offer you agree to serve a notice period of thirty calendar days from acceptance of your resignation to seek release from the current position.


2. Your annual remuneration shall be Rs. {{"{:,.0f}".format(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary + doc.annualized_pf_employer_contribution + doc.annualized_esic_employer_contribution_amount))}} ({{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(frappe.utils.rounded(doc.annual_gross_salary + doc.annualized_pf_employer_contribution + doc.annualized_esic_employer_contribution_amount)) }}) You will also be eligible for Group Medical Insurance coverage. Standard Income tax deductions shall be applicable. Refer Annexure I. You are supposed to submit your tax savings investment declaration form for the financial year (corresponding to assessment year) in order to arrive at your income tax liability.


3. The company also reserves the right to terminate your services without any Notice or without any consolidated amount in lieu thereof on the grounds of misconduct, or even in the case of reasonable suspicion of misconduct, disloyalty, commission of any act involving moral turpitude, or any act of indiscipline or inefficiency or loss of confidence or technical delivery performance issues.


4. Your services are also liable to be terminated if you absent yourself without leave intimation or remain absent beyond the period of leave originally granted or subsequently extended and it shall be construed by the Company that you have voluntarily abandoned your services, unless you return to work within a period of 8 days from the commencement of such absence.


5. You are not eligible for paid leave for the first three months. After the completion of three months, you are eligible for one paid leave per month of service. These paid leaves will be accumulated quarterly (three months) during the current financial year (Apr to Mar). Per quarter you will be entitled to avail 3 Paid leaves. Un-availed paid leaves shall not be carried forward to subsequent financial/fiscal year(s).


6. The regular Office Timings allotted to you are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST, 5 days a week. You may be called upon to work in any shift or any time, depending upon the exigencies of the work. Please note that work timings at the deputed clients’ work site would be as per Client’s sole discretion.


7. This appointment is subject to you being medically examined and found fit. The Management has the right to get you medically examined by any qualified medical practitioner during the period of your services. In case you are found medically unfit to continue with the job, you will lose your lien on the job.


8. This appointment is also subject to satisfactory report from your former employers and the references given by you.


9. During the course of the engagement and if the nature of your job so requires, the Company may send you for specialized training within India or overseas in order to enable you to perform more effectively. In such an event you will be required to execute a training bond with the Company.


10. All other Standard Rules of the Company, as existing now and as may be amended from time to time, will be applicable to you.


11. In the event of the State/Central Government enacting any law conferring the same or similar benefits extended to you under this letter, you will be entitled to the more beneficial of the two, but not both.


12.You are required to maintain the highest order of discipline and confidentiality with regard to the work of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or associate Companies or its Clients. You are required to maintain decorum in accordance with your position. In case of any breach of discipline/trust, your services may be terminated by the Company with immediate effect.


13. All inventions, improvements, discoveries made by you either alone or with other persons w ill become the sole property of the Company. You will ensure that patent protections are obtained for such inventions/improvements and discoveries in India or elsewhere and assign the same to the Company.


14. You are required to devote the whole of your attention and abilities exclusively for the business of the Company and shall in all respects obey and conform to the regulations from time to time framed and issued by the Company and applicable to you. You shall not, while in the engagement with the Company, be engaged in any other employment, business whatsoever or hold any office of profit or accept any other emoluments without previous consent in writing of the Company.


15. This offer of engagement is based on the information furnished in your application for employment, information verified from your former employers, references provided by you and valid background verification report made available to us. If, at any time in future, it comes to light that any of this information is incorrect, false or any relevant information has been withheld or suppressed in any manner, then your services are liable to be terminated without any Notice or any Compensation in lieu thereof.


16. The Company lays emphasis on all statutory compliances and you should ensure compliance with various statutes in your area of operations including Insider Trading Regulations.


17. Income Tax deductions will be done in accordance with relevant provisions of the Income Tax Act 1961 after considering valid tax exemptions and savings done by you during period of your employment relating to corresponding financial year with High Noon Consulting Private Limited.


You are hereby informed that you have to provide us with information & documents regarding your tax savings investments and expenses within a period of 120 days from the date of joining. In case you fail to provide them then differential income tax as may be agreed will be deducted from your salary after prior intimation.


t is hereby informed and you consent that income tax deduction shall be done by the employer(as agreed) as per applicable tax rates in force on salary or other monetary or non-monetary benefits earned from High Noon Consulting Private Limited and that the High Noon Consulting Private Limited (employer) shall not be liable for tax deduction on prior period income earned by the employee.


18. You shall, during the term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year from the date of expiration or termination of this Agreement, refrain from soliciting, recruiting or hiring, or attempting to solicit, recruit or hire, directly or by assisting others, any Personnel of the Company.


19. Your appointment is with effect from the date of joining, which should in any case be not later than {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('joining_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.


20. You are requested to please produce all your originals for a spot verification process and submit a copy of all your credentials for office records duly signed by self.


21. If your engagement on the above term and conditions is acceptable to you, kindly sign the copy of this letter in token of your acceptance and return the same to us for our records by {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('response_date' or ''), "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}.


22. If you fail to convey your acceptance and report on the specified date. It will be presumed that you are not interested on the said engagement and the offer issued to you will be cancelled without any reference.


23. You are required to submit your monthly time sheets along with approval mail from the client as per the company’s protocol in order to process your payroll.


We congratulate you and welcome aboard {{doc.company or ''}} .
